title: BungeeCord服务器无法启动
author: leae
txt_content:
BungeeCord的版本是#701，开服后出现这个


下面是配置文件（其中的BlackWatch1和BlackWatch2都是1.6.4，mcpc+服务器，且都正常开启）
groups:
  bbleae:
  - admin
disabled_commands:
- find
player_limit: -1
stats: b1126e24-1f57-469b-922b-b8a44598ac09
permissions:
  default:
  - bungeecord.command.server
  - bungeecord.command.list
  admin:
  - bungeecord.command.alert
  - bungeecord.command.end
  - bungeecord.command.ip
  - bungeecord.command.reload
listeners:
- max_players: 1
  fallback_server: lobby
  host: 0.0.0.0:25565
  bind_local_address: true
  ping_passthrough: false
  tab_list: GLOBAL_PING
  default_server: lobby
  forced_hosts:
    pvp.md-5.net: pvp
  tab_size: 60
  force_default_server: false
  motd: '&1Another Bungee server'
  query_enabled: false
  query_port: 25565
timeout: 30000
connection_throttle: 4000
servers:
  blackwatch1:
    address: localhost:25588
    restricted: false
    motd: '&e&lBlackWatch'
  blackwatch2:
    address: server6.chinacraft.cc:25587
    restricted: false
    motd: '&e&lBlackWatch'
online_mode: false复制代码

replies.author: 我才是小灰灰
replies.txt_content:
default_server: lobby
默认服务器没有设置，改成你想要进的第一个服务器 比如说你设置的blackwatch1
